title: True Damage Borders Through Shop?
body:
I'm wondering if when I buy the bundles for a champion, does it include the border that you can buy with Worlds Tokens?
I wanted to get multiple borders, but if I can't buy them with RP then I know I have to pick one before tokens expire.

https://imgur.com/RC9rO1Z
https://imgur.com/pDZYFsW

replies.body:
"Border Set".

All those bundles come with the borders included (as pictured).

Those bundles do also expire though.
